TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StateFinalizationActivity extends System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents an activity that executes contained activities before transitioning to another state in a state machine workflow. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This activity acts as a container to a group of activities that will be executed before the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions to another state. The activity container acts as a sequence.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The user-defined name of the activity.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the name of the activity.
